Creates an _OneHotColumn for a one-hot or multi-hot repr in a DNN.

Creates an _OneHotColumn for a one-hot or multi-hot repr in a DNN.

column_one_hot(sparse_id_column)

Arguments

sparse_id_column

A _SparseColumn which is created by column_sparse_with_* or crossed_column functions. Note that combiner defined in sparse_id_column is ignored.

Value

An _OneHotColumn.

See also

Other feature_column wrappers: column_bucketized, column_crossed, column_embedding, column_real_valued, column_sparse_weighted, column_sparse_with_hash_bucket, column_sparse_with_keys

  • Value
